name: Pushing Your Buttons
description:
Pushing Your Buttons is a singleplayer puzzle game, where the goal is to press a series of red and blue buttons to unlock a series of doors to reach the purple button at the end of the level. This game was made by myself in March 2021 for my Intermediate  Game Development class using Unity 2019.4.18f1.

The game's background music is by Kevin MacLeod: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8xrlfhq1j3g&list=PL70EJyu1faZhl3LDl2OoXatYjWWnM8VgW&index=29

Other sound effects are from Freesound.org
